p: The genotype seems to have a role in the severity of diarrhea among different groups. GII.4 infection may caused less severe diarrhea symptoms (χ 2 = 23.40, P < 0.001). Slight seasonal trend was observed in NoV GII.4 had a peak in prevalence in the autumn while GII.17 in the spring (χ 2 = 308.71, P < 0.001). The time distribution showed minor seasonal variations across 3 years, respectively (χ 2 = 151.73, P < 0.001) (Tables 5, 6, 7).
